turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, good day. Yes. Please I want you to help me in ordering coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi. how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks did you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (s) Yeah, Starbucks at 1500 Broadway here in New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just want a cup of coffee with honey and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it hot. A medium size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And did you want to add any milk to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm okay with the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. so you want 1 grande cup of coffee with honey and whipped cream from Starbucks on 1500 broadway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. No problem. Yes, process it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, the total is $2.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I process the payment now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I've submitted the order. It'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've also sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome. Good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye. Thank you.
